channel.title: culture on Remote Work Library
channel.description: Recent content in culture on Remote Work Library

item.title: Virtual Coffee Breaks
item.description: Breaks are important. Taking breaks together with colleagues is also important. What usually just happens in normal office routine needs some coordination and tools in a remote work situation.

item.title: Online Retrospective
item.description: A Retrospective is an opportunity for the Team to inspect itself and create a plan for improvements to be enacted.
